item.title: Source Redefines Variables
item.description: source redefines variables Question I was trying to implement new plugin for tmux https://github.com/imomaliev/tmux-keyboard-layout, but for some reason I kept having an issue with tpm plugin update functionality not working propperly. At the begging I thought this was issue with my plugin or tmux setup. Answer Be careful when using source in bash it could redefine existing variables What I Learned Turns out the issue was with tpm itself, there was regression introduced in https://github.
